actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

official_title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to allow States to regulate tow truck operations.

summary.text: Amends Federal transportation law to exempt from Federal preemption (thus allowing) States to regulate tow truck operations whether or not they are performed without the prior consent or authorization of the transported motor vehicle's owner or operator. (Currently, State regulation of the price of for-hire motor vehicle transportation by a tow truck is permitted only if the transportation is performed without such prior consent.)

titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to allow States to regulate tow truck operations.
